titles.title: Emergency Preparedness in Higher Education Act
Emergency Preparedness in Higher Education Act
To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to establish an emergency preparedness grant program for higher education institutions, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Emergency Preparedness in Higher Education Act
This bill directs the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to establish a grant program to support activities at institutions of higher education related to emergency management.
